sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import Head from 'next/head' import { Player } from '@lottiefiles/react-lottie-player' import useTranslation from '../hooks/useTranslation' import { Container, ContainerImages, ContainerAbout, ContainerMoney, ContainerBuy, ContainerTitleAbout, ContainerTitleMarket, ContainerTitleIncrease, ContainerParagraphAbout, ContainerParagraphIncrease, ImageArrows, ImageGoal, ImagePlayer, ImageBet365White, ImageFifaWhite, ImageSee, Page, Slogan, SubSlogan, Paragraph, ParagraphCard, Title, TitleIncrease, TitleIncreaseSpotlight, TextPink, TextBlue, TextYellow, TextGreen, TextGray, TextBlack, TextPurple, Prove, BoxTitleMarket, BoxTitleAbout, ImagePlus, ImagePlusParagraphFree, ImagePlusParagraph, ImagePlusParagraphSub, ImageZeroRisk, ImageZeroRisco, ImageBarcode, BoxTitleIncrease, ContainerCTA, OverlayDark, OverlayGrey, OverlayLight, CardFree, Card, ButtonFree, ButtonFull, ButtonBuy, Table, VideoBuy, VideoRecomendation, ParagraphCardSub, Price, PriceOld, PriceNew, BoxBadge, } from '../../styles/pages/Landing' import barcode from '../../src/assets/animations/barcode.json' import gift from '../../src/assets/animations/gift.json' import love from '../../src/assets/animations/love.json' import rocket from '../../src/assets/animations/rocket.json' export const Landing = () => { const { t } = useTranslation() const presentation = t('presentation') const about = t('about') const market = t('market') const increase = t('increase') const cta = t('cta') const buy = t('buy') const ImageRisk = ({ language }) => { const isDefault = language === 'en' return isDefault ? : } return ( Brother Bet {presentation.slogan} {presentation.sub_slogan} {about.slogan} {about.paragraph.one.part.one} {about.paragraph.one.part.two} {about.paragraph.one.part.three} {about.paragraph.one.part.four} {about.paragraph.one.part.five}
{about.paragraph.two.part.one} {about.paragraph.two.part.two} {about.paragraph.two.part.three} {market.slogan} {market.paragraph.one} {market.paragraph.two} {market.paragraph.three} {market.paragraph.four} {market.paragraph.five.part.one} {market.paragraph.five.part.two} {market.paragraph.five.part.three} {market.paragraph.six} {market.paragraph.seven}
{increase.slogan.one}
{increase.slogan.two}
{increase.slogan.three}
{increase.slogan.four} {increase.slogan.five}
{increase.paragraph.one} {cta.paragraph.one} {cta.paragraph.two} {cta.button.one} {cta.paragraph.three}
{cta.table.one} vs {cta.table.two}
{cta.table.three} vs {cta.table.four}
{cta.table.five} vs {cta.table.six}
{cta.paragraph.four} {cta.button.two}
{/* */} {buy.badge} {buy.paragraph.one} {buy.paragraph.two.part.one} {buy.paragraph.two.part.two} {buy.paragraph.two.part.three} {buy.paragraph.three.part.one} {buy.paragraph.three.part.two} {buy.paragraph.three.part.three} {buy.paragraph.four.part.one} {buy.paragraph.four.part.two} {buy.paragraph.four.part.three} {buy.button}
) }
